Desc.entry: Manages the village hall. Associated groups include youth club, disabled group, 3 junior rock bands, brass band (see separate entry), French group (term-time only), luncheon club (see separate entry), dance groups (see separate entry), barn dance and other occasional events. Also holds a gala in June, an annual community bonfire in November and a carol tour in December.

Pubs.entry: Committee Meeting Minutes; Annual General Meeting Minutes

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 2nd Thurs in the month at 8pm (Committee Meeting)

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 36
